text: The 2019–20 season was Real Betis's 112th season in existence and the club's 5th consecutive season in the top flight of Spanish football. It covered a period from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. Real Betis competed in La Liga and Copa del Rey. ==Players== . ===Reserve team=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== === In === {| class="wikitable" |- !Date !Player !From !Type !Fee !Ref |- | 30 June
